controlinterface.console.control

Class ConsoleControlInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • controlinterface.iface.AbstractControlInterface
      • controlinterface.console.control.ConsoleControlInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlInterface, GeneralEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeadlessControlInterface

    public class ConsoleControlInterface
extends AbstractControlInterface
implements GeneralEventListener
    A simple user interface controllable from a console.
    Author:
    Stefan Werner
